title: Homemade Caesar Salad Dressing
ingredients: 1teaspoon anchovy paste (found near the canned tuna in the supermarket)
2tablespoons freshly squeezed lemon juice, from one lemon
1teaspoon Dijon mustard (I like the brand Maille)
1cup mayonnaise, best quality such as Hellmann's Real
directions: In a medium bowl, whisk together the garlic, anchovy paste, lemon juice, Dijon mustard and Worcestershire sauce. Add the mayonnaise, Parmigiano-Reggiano, salt and pepper and whisk until well combined. Taste and adjust to your liking. The dressing will keep well in the fridge for about a week.
